00030 #ifndef __BMESH_PY_TYPES_CUSTOMDATA_H__
00031 #define __BMESH_PY_TYPES_CUSTOMDATA_H__
00032 
00033 /* all use BPy_BMLayerAccess struct */
00034 extern PyTypeObject BPy_BMLayerAccessVert_Type;
00035 extern PyTypeObject BPy_BMLayerAccessEdge_Type;
00036 extern PyTypeObject BPy_BMLayerAccessFace_Type;
00037 extern PyTypeObject BPy_BMLayerAccessLoop_Type;
00038 
00039 extern PyTypeObject BPy_BMLayerCollection_Type;
00040 extern PyTypeObject BPy_BMLayerItem_Type;
00041 
00042 #define BPy_BMLayerAccess_Check(v)      (Py_TYPE(v) == &BPy_BMLayerAccess_Type)
00043 #define BPy_BMLayerCollection_Check(v)  (Py_TYPE(v) == &BPy_BMLayerCollection_Type)
00044 #define BPy_BMLayerItem_Check(v)        (Py_TYPE(v) == &BPy_BMLayerItem_Type)
00045 
00046 /* all layers for vert/edge/face/loop */
00047 typedef struct BPy_BMLayerAccess {
00048     PyObject_VAR_HEAD
00049     struct BMesh *bm; /* keep first */
00050     char htype;
00051 } BPy_BMLayerAccess;
00052 
00053 /* access different layer types deform/uv/vertexcolor */
00054 typedef struct BPy_BMLayerCollection {
00055     PyObject_VAR_HEAD
00056     struct BMesh *bm; /* keep first */
00057     char htype;
00058     int  type; /* customdata type - CD_XXX */
00059 } BPy_BMLayerCollection;
00060 
00061 /* access a specific layer directly */
00062 typedef struct BPy_BMLayerItem {
00063     PyObject_VAR_HEAD
00064     struct BMesh *bm; /* keep first */
00065     char htype;
00066     int  type;  /* customdata type - CD_XXX */
00067     int  index; /* index of this layer type */
00068 } BPy_BMLayerItem;
00069 
00070 PyObject *BPy_BMLayerAccess_CreatePyObject(BMesh *bm, const char htype);
00071 PyObject *BPy_BMLayerCollection_CreatePyObject(BMesh *bm, const char htype, int type);
00072 PyObject *BPy_BMLayerItem_CreatePyObject(BMesh *bm, const char htype, int type, int index);
00073 
00074 void BPy_BM_init_types_customdata(void);
00075 
00076 /* __getitem__ / __setitem__ */
00077 PyObject *BPy_BMLayerItem_GetItem(BPy_BMElem *py_ele, BPy_BMLayerItem *py_layer);
00078 int       BPy_BMLayerItem_SetItem(BPy_BMElem *py_ele, BPy_BMLayerItem *py_layer, PyObject *value);
00079 
00080 
00081 #endif /* __BMESH_PY_TYPES_CUSTOMDATA_H__ */
